name: INAddMediaIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface that adds media.

items.name: func resolveMediaDestination(for: INAddMediaIntent, with: (INAddMediaMediaDestinationResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the destination for the added media.

items.name: func resolveMediaItems(for: INAddMediaIntent, with: ([INAddMediaMediaItemResolutionResult]) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the media items to add.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INAddMediaIntent, completion: (INAddMediaIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms the details of the media addition request.
